name: compare-vuepress
description: Comparision of VuePress, Docusaurus and GitBook.
author: Warren Anderson

scripts.test:links: for file in $(find ./docs/pre-alpha -path ./node_modules -prune -false -o -name "*.md"); do markdown-link-check --verbose --config .markdown-link-check.config.json "$file" || exit 1; done;
scripts.docs:dev: yarn run copy:navbar; yarn run copy:sidebar; NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: yarn run copy:navbar; yarn run copy:sidebar; vuepress build docs
